language.title: Language
language.description: Descriptions and external contents can be stored in different languages

name.title: Name
name.description:
Name of the product.
 Likely to be the first thing displayed on a wallet app.

sku.title: SKU
sku.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) is an alphanumeric code assigned to a product by a business to identify the price, product options and manufacturer of the merchandise.

gtin.title: GTIN
gtin.description: The Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) is a globally unique 14-digit number used to identify trade items, products, or services. GTIN is also an umbrella term that refers to the entire family of UCC. EAN data structures. The entire family of data structures within the GTIN is: GTIN-12 (UPC).

brandInternalId.title: Brand Internal ID
brandInternalId.description: Identification number that end customers will not have access to.

category.title: Category
category.description: Information on the broad category the product belongs to.

subCategory.title: Sub Category
subCategory.description: Information on the specific category the product belongs to.
subCategory.temp: Shirt Dress T-shirt Sweater Vest Jacket Denim Pants Skirt Swim

intended.title: Intended
intended.description: Information on the target customer market of the product.
intended.temp: Women's Men's Youth-Girls Youth-Boys Toddler-Girls Todder-Boys Infant-Girls Infant-Boys Adult Gender Neutral/Non-binary

serialnumber.title: Serial Number
serialnumber.description: Identification numbers that end customers will have access to.

subBrand.title: Sub Brand
subBrand.description: This field may be used when a product is part of a sub Brand owned by the Brand who creates the certificate.

model.title: Model
model.description:
Model of the product to bring precisions to the Name.
 Likely to be the second thing displayed on a wallet app.

description.title: Description
description.description:
Description of the product. (HTML Accepted)
 A description can be stored for each language

externalContents.description:
This field is designed to store the links to external contents the Brand whish to introduce to the end customer in a wallet app.
 Specific external contents can be stored for each language.
externalContents.title: External Contents

oneOf.title: proofLinkAction
oneOf.description: Link with a proof of ownership. The difference with arianeeAccessTokenAuthLink is that proofLinkAction does need blockchain transaction. It is not instant but can be revoked.

oneOf.title: arianeeAccessTokenAuthLink
oneOf.description: Link with a Arianee Access Token, proof of ownership. The difference with proofLinkAction is that arianeeAccessTokenAuthLink does not need blockchain transaction. It is instant but cannnot be revoked. However it does expire.

msrp.title: Manufacturers suggested retail price
msrp.description: The manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP) is the price a product's producer recommends it be sold for in retail stores. MSRP Country should respect ISO 3166 alpha-3

msrpCountry.title: Country (msrp)
msrpCountry.description: Country of Intended Original Sale (ISO 3166 alpha-3)

medias.title: Medias
medias.description: Picture & media used to support the presentation of the product in the wallet app.  (ideally .png with transparent background and square, less than 1mo)

oneOf.title: Product media / picture
oneOf.description: used to support the presentation of the product in the wallet app.  (ideally .png with transparent background and square, less than 1mo)

oneOf.title: Brand Item Background Picture (3200x1900) ratioed
oneOf.description: (3200x1900), format : jpg/png, max 400ko created for the certificate in the list of certificates someone has. It should include a product picture.

oneOf.title: Item Background Picture (3000x3000) ratioed
oneOf.description: dark, format .jpg, (3000x3000) max 400ko created for the background of the certificate screen

oneOf.title: Certificate Background Picture (1900x3200 TBD) preferably dark - with logo on top
oneOf.description: dark, no logo, format .jpg, (1900x3200), max 400ko created for the background of the transfer/proof of certificate screens

customAttributes.title: Custom attributes
customAttributes.description: Information on the specific attributes of the product.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Information on the specific attributes of the product that are aimed to be shared with partners.

trait_type.title: Trait Type (for external service like opensea)

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: Information on the materials used to manufacture the product.

material.title: Material
material.temp: Cashmere / Cotton / Denim - Jeans / Exotic leathers / Faux fur / Fur /Leather / Linen / Polyester / Silk / Suede / Synthetic / Tweed / Velvet / Viscose / Wool

size.title: Sizes
size.description: Information on the size of the product.

manufacturingCountry.title: Country (manufacturing)
manufacturingCountry.description: Country of manufacture in final assembly stage. (ISO 3166 alpha-3)

facilityId.title: Facility Identification number
facilityId.description: Facility Identification in Open Apparel Registry (OAR) or GS1 database

productCertification.title: Product Certifications & Compliance
productCertification.description:
Certifications a Brand owns at the product level. 
It is currently an information not verified and the Brand bares all responsibilities related to its affiliation to a certification.

description.title: Description
description.description:
Description of the product. (HTML Accepted)
 A description can be stored for each language

medias.title: Medias
medias.description: Picture & media used to support the presentation of the product in the wallet app.  (ideally .png with transparent background and square, less than 1mo)

oneOf.title: icon of label
oneOf.description: An icon depicting the transparency item (png transparent)

oneOf.title: Transparency picture
oneOf.description: A picture depicting the transparency item

externalContents.description:
This field is designed to store the links to external contents the Brand whish to introduce to the end customer in a wallet app.
 Specific external contents can be stored for each language.
externalContents.title: External Contents

parentCertificates.description: This field is designed to store the links to parent certificates.
parentCertificates.title: Parent Certificates

image_data.title: Raw SVG image data (for external services like OpenSea)
image_data.description: Raw SVG image data for external services.

external_url.title: External URL (for external services like OpenSea)
